verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6485>visited<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> he had <S%H559>said,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> unto <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> he had <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

For <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> in his old <S%H2208>age,<s%> at the set <S%H4150>time<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to him.

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H1121>son<s%> that was <S%H3205>born<s%> unto him, <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> to him, <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%>

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> being <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him.
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> was a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> <S%H853>when<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> was <S%H3205>born<s%> unto him.
And <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H6213>made<s%> me to <S%H6712>laugh,<s%> so that <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H8085>hear<s%> will <S%H6711>laugh<s%> with me.

And she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> would have <S%H4448>said<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> that <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> should have given children <S%H3243>suck?<s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I have <S%H3205>born<s%> him a <S%H1121>son<s%> in his old <S%H2208>age.<s%>

And the <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H1431>grew,<s%> and was <S%H1580>weaned:<s%> and <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4960>feast<s%> the same <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H853>that<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> was <S%H1580>weaned.<s%>

And <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> she had <S%H3205>born<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H6711>mocking.<s%>

Wherefore she <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> Cast <S%H1644>out<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H519>bondwoman<s%> and her <S%H1121>son:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H519>bondwoman<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H3423>heir<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> even <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%>
And the <S%H1697>thing<s%> was very <S%H7489>grievous<s%> <S%H3966><s%> in <S%H85>Abraham's<s%> <S%H5869>sight<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H182><s%> of his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> Let it <S%H408>not<s%> be <S%H7489>grievous<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%> because <S%H5921>of<s%> the <S%H5288>lad,<s%> and because <S%H5921>of<s%> thy <S%H519>bondwoman;<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> hath <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto her <S%H6963>voice;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> in <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> shall thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> be <S%H7121>called.<s%>
And <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H853><s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H519>bondwoman<s%> will I <S%H7760>make<s%> a <S%H1471>nation,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is thy <S%H2233>seed.<s%>

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and a <S%H2573>bottle<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1904>Hagar,<s%> <S%H7760>putting<s%> it <S%H5921>on<s%> her <S%H7926>shoulder,<s%> and the <S%H3206>child,<s%> and sent her <S%H7971>away:<s%> and she <S%H1980>departed,<s%> and <S%H8582>wandered<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H884>Beer-sheba.<s%>

And the <S%H4325>water<s%> was <S%H3615>spent<s%> <S%H4480>in<s%> the <S%H2573>bottle,<s%> and she <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H7880>shrubs.<s%>

And she <S%H1980>went,<s%> and sat her <S%H3427>down<s%> over <S%H4480>against<s%> <S%H5048><s%> him a good way <S%H7368>off,<s%> as it were a <S%H2909>bowshot:<s%> <S%H7198><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> she <S%H559>said,<s%> Let me <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H3206>child.<s%> And she <S%H3427>sat<s%> over <S%H4480>against<s%> <S%H5048><s%> him, and lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H5288>lad;<s%> and the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, <S%H4100>What<s%> aileth thee, <S%H1904>Hagar?<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H408>not;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H413><s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H5288>lad<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is.

Arise, <S%H6965><s%> lift <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5288>lad,<s%> and <S%H2388>hold<s%> him <S%H854>in<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I will <S%H7760>make<s%> him a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6491>opened<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and she <S%H7200>saw<s%> a <S%H875>well<s%> of <S%H4325>water;<s%> and she <S%H1980>went,<s%> and <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2573>bottle<s%> with <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H853>gave<s%> the <S%H5288>lad<s%> <S%H8248>drink.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H5288>lad;<s%> and he <S%H1431>grew,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H1961>became<s%> an <S%H7235>archer.<s%> <S%H7199><s%>

And he <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6290>Paran:<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> him a <S%H802>wife<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%> that <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> and <S%H6369>Phichol<s%> the chief <S%H8269>captain<s%> of his <S%H6635>host<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5973>with<s%> thee in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> doest: <S%H6213><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore <S%H7650>swear<s%> unto me <S%H2008>here<s%> by <S%H430>God<s%> that thou wilt not deal <S%H8266>falsely<s%> with me, nor with my <S%H5209>son,<s%> nor with my son's <S%H5220>son:<s%> but according to the <S%H2617>kindness<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H5973>unto<s%> thee, thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5978>unto<s%> me, and <S%H5973>to<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> thou hast <S%H1481>sojourned.<s%>
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> will <S%H7650>swear.<s%>

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3198>reproved<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> because <S%H5921>of<s%> <S%H182><s%> a <S%H875>well<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> had violently taken <S%H1497>away.<s%>

And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> didst <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> me, <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1571>yet<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> of it, <S%H1115>but<s%> <S%H3117>today.<s%>

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them unto <S%H40>Abimelech;<s%> and <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5324>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> ewe <S%H3535>lambs<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> by <S%H905>themselves.<s%>

And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> mean <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> ewe <S%H3535>lambs<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H5324>set<s%> by <S%H905>themselves?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>For<s%> <S%H853>these<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> ewe <S%H3535>lambs<s%> shalt thou <S%H3947>take<s%> of my <S%H4480>hand,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H5668>that<s%> they may <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H5713>witness<s%> unto me, <S%H3588>that<s%> I have <S%H2658>digged<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H875>well.<s%>

Wherefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> he <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H884>Beer-sheba;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H7650>swore<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them.

Thus they <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> at <S%H884>Beer-sheba:<s%> then <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and <S%H6369>Phichol<s%> the chief <S%H8269>captain<s%> of his <S%H6635>host,<s%> and they <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

And Abraham <S%H5193>planted<s%> a <S%H815>grove<s%> in <S%H884>Beer-sheba,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%>
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H1481>sojourned<s%> in the <S%H6430>Philistines'<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
